org.dyn4j.geometry

Class Wound

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dyn4j.geometry.AbstractShape
      • org.dyn4j.geometry.Wound
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Shape, Transformable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Polygon, Segment

    public abstract class Wound
extends AbstractShape
implements Shape, Transformable
    Represents an object that is defined by vertices, and has counter-clockwise winding.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    3.0.2
    Author:
    William Bittle
